_comment: This is the server configuration file for the 6ol Temple Bot. Edit this file to customize your server setup when using the /setup-server command.

_instructions.categories: Define Discord server categories with their channels. Channels can be simple strings or objects with 'name' and 'hidden' properties.
_instructions.roles: List of role names to be created in the server. Roles will be created in the order specified.
_instructions.channelTypes: Channels marked as 'hidden' will be private channels visible only to specific roles.
_instructions.editing: You can modify channel names, category names, and roles as needed. Ensure proper JSON syntax is maintained.
